target_markets.market_description: Web2 entrepreneurs and tech leaders transitioning to Web3/NFT space
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Multiple successful Web2 entrepreneurs all circling around Web3 simultaneously indicates significant market opportunity

problems_validated.problem: Successful entrepreneurs risk losing their edge and missing the next big technology wave
problems_validated.severity: High - can result in being left behind in major market shifts
problems_validated.current_solutions: Relying on existing networks and past success patterns
problems_validated.market_gap: Need for systematic approach to identify and evaluate emerging technologies before they become mainstream

products_tools.name: CryptoPunks
products_tools.use_case: Digital collectibles and Web3 entry point

products_tools.name: NBA Top Shot
products_tools.use_case: Sports collectibles and mainstream NFT adoption

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage network of successful peers to identify emerging opportunities
business_strategies.implementation: Maintain relationships with smart, successful people from previous technology waves and monitor what excites them
business_strategies.expected_results: Early identification of major technology shifts before they become mainstream
business_strategies.case_study: Gary's Web2 network all simultaneously reaching out about Web3/NFTs in early 2021

business_strategies.strategy: Build and maintain a curated network of technology leaders across generations
business_strategies.implementation: Identify people who have proven ability to spot technology changes and stay connected with them
business_strategies.expected_results: Access to early signals about emerging technologies and markets
business_strategies.case_study: Kevin Rose alerting Gary to CryptoPunks leading to deeper Web3 exploration

problems_solutions.problem: How to identify the next major technology wave before it becomes obvious
problems_solutions.solution: Monitor what smart, successful people from previous waves are getting excited about
steps: Build network of proven technology leaders
Stay connected even during quiet periods
Pay attention when multiple smart people reach out about same topic

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Getting too comfortable with wealth and losing hunger for new opportunities
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing major technology shifts and losing competitive edge
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Stay engaged with emerging technologies even when financially comfortable
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Some Web2 icons who 'didn't get it' initially but came back months later saying 'shit'

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Dismissing new technology trends without proper investigation
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Being late to major market opportunities
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: When multiple smart people are excited about something, investigate immediately
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Icons who initially didn't understand Web3/NFTs but realized their mistake 6-8 weeks later

growth_tactics.tactic: Leverage network effects from previous technology waves

trends_signals.opportunity: Major technology shift creating new business models and markets

trends_signals.trend: Renaissance period for Web2 entrepreneurs in Web3 space
trends_signals.opportunity: Experienced entrepreneurs applying Web2 lessons to Web3 opportunities

actionable_quotes.quote: you could see the spidey senses of the people that really understand when shit changes
actionable_quotes.context: Describing how successful Web2 entrepreneurs all started reaching out about Web3 simultaneously
actionable_quotes.actionability: Build network of people with proven ability to spot technology changes

actionable_quotes.quote: it feels like web2o's beginning when nobody understood social media and content that's exactly what's happening with nfts
actionable_quotes.context: Comparing current Web3/NFT moment to early Web2/social media days
actionable_quotes.actionability: Recognize similar patterns between technology adoption cycles

actionable_quotes.quote: when you guys get to my age you've got that extra generation you're going to have your whole little crew of the people you've decided over this decade are smart are good
actionable_quotes.context: Advice about building long-term networks of smart people
actionable_quotes.actionability: Intentionally curate and maintain relationships with proven smart people over decades
